word:
But while the health work has its place in the promulgation of the third angel's message, its advocates must not in any way strive to make it take the place of the message.  {TSDF 144.10}  

Chapter 42 - Tea and Coffee

                                               C. T. & B. H.--34-36 
     Tea, coffee, and tobacco, as well as alcoholic drinks, are different degrees in the scale of artificial stimulants.
